mapper.sql: id, user_id, name, price, link, remark, achieved, achieved_at, created_at, updated_at
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wishlist ( id, user_id, name, price, link, remark, achieved, achieved_at, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{link}, #{remark}, IFNULL(#{achieved}, FALSE), #{achievedAt}, IFNULL(#{createdAt}, NOW()), IFNULL(#{updatedAt}, NOW()) )
mapper.update: UPDATE wishlist SET name = #{name}, price = #{price}, link = #{link}, remark = #{remark}, achieved = #{achieved}, achieved_at = #{achievedAt}, updated_at = IFNULL(#{updatedAt}, NOW()) WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
